name: Export all Mantis BT Issues (with no limit) to Google Sheet
description:
When you need to export all the Mantis BT issues, and you hit the 3200 records limit, you can use this workaround with the Make an API call module. 
The time limit 45 minutes for running the scenario applies. If you're unable to get all your records in that time, set the Repeater's "Initial value" to start after the last page you've received and run the scenario again. When no more records are returned, the scenario will stop.
